llm.feedback: Your draft already captures the key catalysts, but it needs tightening to meet the strict format and depth requirements. 1) **Movers & Scenarios**: keep exactly four lines, each with the exact six fields (Up/Down, Time window, Driver/Mechanism, What to watch, Probability %).  Remove any extra commas or parenthetical notes that break the “What to watch” field; list only the primary signal(s).  2) **Probabilities**: base them on the weight of evidence in the source material.  For the 1–2‑week Up, 70 % is justified by the strong dovish speech (OGK8WLL69) and Switch 2 sales >2 M units (K2JWRPXRV).  For the 3–4‑week Up, 60 % is reasonable given the crypto inflows (OGK8WLL69) and soy export tightness (J54PXL0NV).  For the Down scenarios, reduce the 40 % to 35 % and the 30 % to 25 % to reflect the lower likelihood of a tariff spike (218AGGUXB) and an AI slowdown (1GVYF2V8O).  3) **Trade/Outlook Plan**: keep a single line, but replace “Current level” with a concrete price if available; otherwise note “at market close”. Apply these edits and the output will meet the world‑class, actionable standard.
